about_the_game: A beautiful story-driven game created by Tom Black, an average 16-year-old kid who just wants to find where he belongs, Lone Wolf is a third-person exploration game placed inside of an eye-catching stylized forest with nature all around. Players control a stunning wolf who was born without a pack and is trying to find a place where he fits in. Along the way, players encounter other animals and secrets which will lead you to uncover your true self.
